title: PC 11 March - Fincantieri is also disposed of torpedoes and sonar with the purchase of the Wass and increases the war potential of Italian imperialism
content:
Fincantieri is increasingly on road of greater war production: in addition to Vario's military ships type produced in Italy and abroad and sold all over the world now passes Also to the direct production of torpedoes and sonar: “It is in advanced interviews with Leonardo for the acquisition of Wass activities, the Livorno company that It operates in the underwater industry, with the production of torpedoes and sonar ... " (Sole24ore 6 March)

And the accounts are very good! Fincantieri, in fact, according to his report: “he concluded 2023 with a Ebitda (earnings before interest, taxes, devaluations e of depreciation) of 397 million euros, recording an increase of approximately 80% compared to the previous year. Revenues grew by 2.8%, reaching 7.651 billion euros ... and a cash generation of 200 millions ", and according to the CEO Folgiero will still grow in 2024: “provides for revenues of approximately 8 billion euros, up 4.5%, respecting the targets of the industrial plan presented last May. In addition, Ebitda Margin should stand around 6%, continuously growing in line with the objectives of the plan. "

This "accelerated" passage Under diver's arms also seems to the fact that lately there have been "Accidents" that damaged submarine cables for communications (Internet): only in Red Sea “They would be At least four damaged underwater cables ...: the AAE-1 cable (Asia-Africa-Europa 1, 25 thousand kilometers long, from Southeast Asia to Europe; The Seaucom cable (17 thousand kilometers cable connecting South Africa, Kenya, Tanzania, Mozambique, Gibuti, France and India); The Europe cable India Gateway (EIG) of 15 thousand kilometers. At least for one of these cables there is confirmation Damage officer: it is the Seaucom cable)

The tendency to an armament more and more complete and aggressive in all fields it is confirmed, as well as yes confirms the collaboration with Leonardo S.p.A, all e two in the hands of the current government through the Cassa Depositi e Prestiti (71.3% from CDP Industry, financial financial of Cassa Depositi e Prestiti-social controlled by Ministry of Economy and Finance).

This modern fascist government, As we have already said, it is active, in one way or another, in the massacres in course of peoples such as the Palestinians, and not only wants to dismantle everything that represents an obstacle to the profits made with the production and sale of weapons a Anyone who wants to buy them, in violation of the Constitution and the laws Italian, like 185/90, but acts with rearmament in all sectors.

It is therefore necessary to continue to manifest against the imperialist war and fight against the government Meloni warfounder, accomplice of the genocide of Palestinian people.
